snippet.title: Frostpunk: Console Edition | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Frostpunk: Console Edition - an unmatched society survival game with complex strategic gameplay coming to Xbox One and PlayStation 4 this Summer!
Read more here: http://www.frostpunkgame.com/fp_consoles_announcement

THE CITY MUST SURVIVE
Frostpunk is a society survival game where heat means life and every decision comes at a price. Presenting complex strategic gameplay, demanding challenges and rich story, Frostpunk extends its unmatched survival experience to consoles. Adapted to the new platforms, with revised controls and adjusted mechanics - Frostpunk: Console Edition allows you to fully test your tactical prowess on the frozen wastelands.

KEY FEATURES

MAINTAIN THE HOPE
Survival is about hope and will to live. Your ability to spark and maintain these two in your people will be a determinant factor for success.

WEIGHT YOUR CHOICES
Will you allow child-labour? How will you treat the sick and wounded?
Frostpunk challenges tactical skills while questioning your morality.

MAKE THE LAW
Society is a group of people abiding the same rules and sharing similar beliefs. Establishing laws and customs will be a crucial factor shaping your society.

EXPLORE
Expeditions, while risky, can bring you valuable intel, precious supplies and grow your society’s population. There may be people out there, and their fate lies solely in your hands.

PLAY ENDLESSLY
Endless Mode offers new maps, game modes, mechanics, and allows you to dive into the Frostpunk experience deeper than ever before.

Frostpunk: Console Edition contains all the previous free updates from the PC version, including The Fall of Winterhome scenario, additional customization options, difficulty settings, and balance tweaks. Furthermore, additional content updates are planned for the future.

--- Media about Frostpunk ---

"(...) this is a game about finding reasons to survive rather than just the means to go on living."
- Adam Smith, Rock, Paper, Shotgun

"In a steampunk ice age, the only thing that can be crueler than the bitter cold are the decisions you have to make to keep your people alive."
- Stephanie Chan, VentureBeat

"(...) decisions push your morality to its limits for the sake of productivity, which could make for a captivating, draining adventure when the game releases later this year."
- Suriel Vazquez, Game Informer

--- Where to follow us ---
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/frostpunkgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/frostpunkgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/11bitstudios/
Official Frostpunk Wiki: https://frostpunk.gamepedia.com/Frostpunk_Wiki
Fan Discord Server: https://discord.gg/CukfhBG

Trailer credits:
Animation by: Deep Blue / www.deep-blue.com
Video edit by: Dawid Kurowski 
Music by: Piotr Musiał.

#Frostpunk #Survival #Strategy
